meanings.definition: A reproduction of a document transmitted electronically.
meanings.sent1: I received the telefacsimiles of the contract via email.
meanings.sent2: The office uses telefacsimiles to quickly share important papers.
meanings.sent3: The telefacsimiles of the report were so clear, it felt like magic!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a telefacsimile machine, perfectly replicating every detail.
meanings.sent5: The telefacsimiles of the map made it easy to navigate the city.

meanings.definition: To transmit a document electronically for reproduction.
meanings.sent1: We telefacsimile the paperwork to our clients for review.
meanings.sent2: He telefacsimiles the sketches to the design team for feedback.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to telefacsimile itself onto the couch when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His words telefacsimiled across the room, reaching every ear with precision.
meanings.sent5: The music telefacsimiled through the air, filling the room with melody.
